CarCovers.title: Waterproof Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Triple-stitched, heavy-duty waterproof car cover with a soft inner lining to protect paint.

CarCovers.title: UV Protection Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Reflective material protects against UV rays, dust, and heat. Comes with buckle straps.

CarCovers.title: Breathable Dustproof Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Lightweight and breathable fabric to prevent moisture buildup while protecting from dust.

CarCovers.title: All-Weather Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Multi-layered cover designed to protect against rain, snow, sun, and scratches.

CarCovers.title: Elastic Hem Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Features an elastic hem for a snug fit and mirror pockets for convenience.

CarCovers.title: Custom-Fit Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Tailor-made to fit a specific car model perfectly, ensuring maximum protection.

CarCovers.title: Car Cover with Antenna Pocket
CarCovers.description: Includes a dedicated pocket for the car's antenna for a better fit.

CarCovers.title: Indoor Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Soft, stretchable fabric ideal for protecting cars stored in a garage from dust and dirt.

CarCovers.title: Camouflage Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Stylish camouflage pattern cover that is also waterproof and UV resistant.

CarCovers.title: Half Car Cover (Top Cover)
CarCovers.description: Covers the top part of the car, protecting the windshield and roof from sun and frost.

CarCovers.title: Scratch-Resistant Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Features a soft, non-abrasive lining that prevents scratches on the car's paint.

CarCovers.title: Heavy-Duty Truck Cover
CarCovers.description: Extra-large and durable cover designed specifically for trucks and SUVs.

CarCovers.title: Car Cover with Zipper Door
CarCovers.description: Convenient zipper on the driver's side allows access to the car without removing the cover.

CarCovers.title: Satin Stretch Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Luxurious satin fabric that stretches for a custom-like fit, for indoor use.

CarCovers.title: Lightweight Polyester Car Cover
CarCovers.description: Easy to handle and store, provides basic protection from dust and sun.

InteriorAccessories.title: 7D Car Floor Mats
InteriorAccessories.description: Custom-fit 7D mats providing edge-to-edge coverage and a luxurious look.

InteriorAccessories.title: Leatherette Seat Covers
InteriorAccessories.description: High-quality artificial leather seat covers that are durable and easy to clean.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Steering Wheel Cover
InteriorAccessories.description: Provides a better grip and protects the steering wheel from wear and tear.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Air Purifier
InteriorAccessories.description: HEPA filter air purifier that removes dust, pollen, smoke, and odors from the car cabin.

InteriorAccessories.title: Dashboard Trim & Decor
InteriorAccessories.description: Decorative trim pieces to enhance the look of the car's dashboard.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Armrest Cushion
InteriorAccessories.description: Memory foam armrest pad for added comfort during long drives.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Backseat Organizer
InteriorAccessories.description: Hangs on the back of the front seat with multiple pockets to store essentials.

InteriorAccessories.title: Sun Shades for Windows
InteriorAccessories.description: Set of mesh sun shades to block sunlight and keep the car interior cool.

InteriorAccessories.title: Gear Shift Knob Cover
InteriorAccessories.description: Silicone or leather cover for the gear knob for a better feel and protection.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Trash Can
InteriorAccessories.description: Leakproof, portable garbage bin to keep your car clean and organized.

InteriorAccessories.title: Neck Rest Pillows (Set of 2)
InteriorAccessories.description: Ergonomic neck pillows for driver and passenger seat for enhanced comfort.

InteriorAccessories.title: Interior LED Ambient Lighting Kit
InteriorAccessories.description: Multi-color LED strips with remote control to create a custom ambiance inside the car.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Document Holder
InteriorAccessories.description: Organizer for keeping registration, insurance, and other important documents safe.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Seat Gap Filler
InteriorAccessories.description: Prevents items like phones and keys from falling into the gap between the seat and console.

InteriorAccessories.title: Car Coasters (Set of 4)
InteriorAccessories.description: Absorbent coasters that fit in the car's cup holders to keep them clean and dry.

CarMobileHolders.title: Magnetic AC Vent Mobile Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Strong magnetic holder that clips onto the car's AC vent for easy access.

CarMobileHolders.title: Dashboard & Windshield Mount
CarMobileHolders.description: Suction cup holder with an adjustable arm that can be mounted on the dashboard or windshield.

CarMobileHolders.title: Gravity-Sensing Mobile Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Automatically clamps the phone when placed in the holder using its own weight.

CarMobileHolders.title: CD Slot Mobile Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Utilizes the car's CD player slot for a secure and stable mounting point.

CarMobileHolders.title: Cup Holder Phone Mount
CarMobileHolders.description: Adjustable base fits securely in the car's cup holder, with a flexible gooseneck.

CarMobileHolders.title: Wireless Charging Car Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Combines a secure phone mount with Qi wireless charging capabilities.

CarMobileHolders.title: Long Arm Windshield Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Features an extra-long, flexible arm for optimal positioning of the phone.

CarMobileHolders.title: Rearview Mirror Phone Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Clips onto the car's rearview mirror for a line-of-sight view.

CarMobileHolders.title: Sticky Gel Pad Dashboard Mount
CarMobileHolders.description: Non-slip gel pad that holds the phone on the dashboard without any clamps.

CarMobileHolders.title: Pop-Socket Compatible Mount
CarMobileHolders.description: Designed to work with Pop-Sockets and other phone grips.

CarMobileHolders.title: Steering Wheel Phone Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: A simple clip that attaches your phone to the steering wheel (for use when parked).

CarMobileHolders.title: Headrest Mount for Tablets/Phones
CarMobileHolders.description: Attaches to the front seat headrest for backseat passenger entertainment.

CarMobileHolders.title: 360-Degree Rotation Mobile Holder
CarMobileHolders.description: Allows for full 360-degree rotation for both portrait and landscape viewing.

CarMobileHolders.title: Automatic Clamping Car Mount
CarMobileHolders.description: Features an infrared sensor that opens and closes the clamps automatically.

CarMobileHolders.title: Compact Magnetic Sticker Mount
CarMobileHolders.description: A small magnetic disc that sticks to any flat surface on your dashboard.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Portable Jump Starter
CarRepairAssistance.description: Compact lithium-ion jump starter that also functions as a power bank.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Hydraulic Bottle Jack
CarRepairAssistance.description: Powerful hydraulic jack for lifting the vehicle for tyre changes and repairs.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Car Tool Kit (Mechanic's Set)
CarRepairAssistance.description: Comprehensive tool set including sockets, wrenches, and screwdrivers for car repairs.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Emergency Warning Triangle

CarRepairAssistance.title: Tow Rope with Hooks

CarRepairAssistance.description: Diagnostic tool to read and clear engine fault codes and view live data.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Emergency Hammer & Seatbelt Cutter

CarRepairAssistance.title: Portable Fire Extinguisher
CarRepairAssistance.description: Compact ABC type fire extinguisher suitable for use in cars.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Digital Tyre Pressure Gauge
CarRepairAssistance.description: Easy-to-use digital gauge for accurate tyre pressure readings.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Windshield Repair Kit
CarRepairAssistance.description: DIY kit to repair small chips and cracks in the car's windshield.

CarRepairAssistance.title: Mechanic's Creeper Seat
CarRepairAssistance.description: Rolling creeper seat for comfortable working under and around the vehicle.

CarRepairAssistance.title: First Aid Kit for Car
CarRepairAssistance.description: Comprehensive first aid kit with essentials for roadside emergencies.

Helmets.title: Full-Face Helmet

Helmets.description: Versatile helmet that combines the safety of a full-face with the convenience of an open-face.

Helmets.title: Motocross Helmet
Helmets.description: Designed for off-road riding with an elongated chin bar and peak for extra protection.

Helmets.title: Helmet with Double Visor
Helmets.description: Features an inner smoke sunshield in addition to the main clear visor.

Helmets.title: Carbon Fiber Helmet
Helmets.description: Extremely lightweight and strong helmet made from carbon fiber for premium protection.

Helmets.title: Bluetooth Integrated Helmet
Helmets.description: Helmet with built-in Bluetooth for hands-free calls and music on the go.

Helmets.title: Ladies' Helmet
Helmets.description: Stylish and lightweight helmets designed with graphics and colors for women riders.

Helmets.title: Kids' Helmet
Helmets.description: Smaller and lighter helmets with fun graphics to ensure safety for young pillion riders.

Helmets.title: Half Helmet (Cruiser Style)
Helmets.description: Minimalist half helmet, popular with cruiser motorcycle riders.

Helmets.title: Helmet with Anti-Fog Visor
Helmets.description: Comes with a Pinlock-ready or coated visor to prevent fogging in cold weather.

Helmets.title: High-Visibility Helmet
Helmets.description: Helmet in fluorescent colors like yellow or green to enhance rider visibility.

Helmets.title: Touring Helmet
Helmets.description: Designed for long-distance comfort with superior ventilation and aerodynamics.

Helmets.title: Helmet Lock
Helmets.description: Cable lock to secure your helmet to your motorcycle when not in use.

Helmets.title: Replacement Helmet Visor
Helmets.description: Replacement visors available in clear, smoke, or mirrored finishes.

BikeAccessories.title: Motorcycle Alarm System

BikeAccessories.title: Custom Handlebar Grips

BikeAccessories.title: Crash Guard / Leg Guard

BikeAccessories.description: Compact and portable tool kit with essentials for roadside repairs.

BikeAccessories.title: Motorcycle Tail Box
BikeAccessories.description: Lockable storage box that mounts on the rear carrier of the motorcycle.

BikeAccessories.title: Tyre Hugger / Rear Mudguard
BikeAccessories.description: Custom rear mudguard to prevent mud and water splash.

BikeAccessories.title: Motorcycle Seat Cover
BikeAccessories.description: Mesh or cushioned seat cover for added comfort and airflow.

BikeLEDLights.description: Multi-color RGB LED strips to add accent lighting to the bike's underbody.

BikeLEDLights.title: LED Strobe Lights

BikeLEDLights.description: LED strips that attach to the wheel rims for a stunning visual effect.

SafetyGearClothing.title: Riding Jacket (Armored)

SafetyGearClothing.title: Riding Gloves (Full Gauntlet)
SafetyGearClothing.description: Full gauntlet gloves with knuckle protection and wrist support for maximum safety.

SafetyGearClothing.title: Riding Boots
SafetyGearClothing.description: Ankle-high or full-length boots with reinforced toe, heel, and ankle protection.

SafetyGearClothing.title: Body Armor / Chest Protector
SafetyGearClothing.description: Protective vest with chest, back, and shoulder armor for off-road or track riding.

SafetyGearClothing.title: Knee & Elbow Guards
SafetyGearClothing.description: Set of knee and elbow guards that can be worn over or under clothing.

SafetyGearClothing.title: Back Protector Insert

SafetyGearClothing.description: Noise-reducing earplugs designed to filter out harmful wind noise.

SafetyGearClothing.title: Base Layer (Thermal)
